summary.span: 提供一組豐富 OpenType 印刷樣式屬性的存取權。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件會公開一組功能，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]字型支援。The object exposes the set of features that an [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] font supports. 藉由設定的屬性標記或程式碼，您可以輕鬆撰寫充分利用的文件[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)]功能。By setting the properties of in markup or code, you can easily author documents that take advantage of [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_opentype](~/includes/tlasharptla-opentype-md.md)] features. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的標準大寫字母，後面接著樣式設定為 "SmallCaps" 和 "AllSmallCaps" 的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 在此情況下，三個單字全都使用相同的字型大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大寫的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大寫的文字")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 使用 OpenType 大寫的文字Text using OpenType capitals 下列標記範例示範如何定義使用的屬性 Pescadero 字型的大寫字物件。The following markup example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using properties of the object. 使用 "SmallCaps" 格式時會略過任何開頭的大寫字母。When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored. The index of the alternate annotation form.
The default value is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 註釋形式包含圖像 （glyph） 放置在開啟或實心圓、 正方形、 括號、 菱形或圓角的方塊。Annotation forms include glyphs placed in open or solid circles, squares, parentheses, diamonds or rounded boxes. 如果值大於零與所選取的字型不支援註釋的替代項目時，會顯示字母的預設表單。If the value of is greater than zero and the selected font does not support annotation alternates, the default form of the letter is displayed. 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.AnnotationAlternates**="*int*"/>\<*object* **Typography.AnnotationAlternates**="*int*"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

A enumerated value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 大寫字是一組以大寫樣式字符轉譯文字的印刷格式。Capitals are a set of typographical forms that render text in capital-styled glyphs. 一般而言，當文字全部轉譯為大寫時，字母之間的間距可能太近，字母的加權和比例會過重。Typically, when text is rendered as all capitals, the spacing between letters can appear too tight, and the weight and proportion of the letters too heavy. OpenType 支援大寫字，包括小型大寫字、 特小大寫字、 標題和大寫字母間距數目樣式格式。OpenType supports a number of styling formats for capitals, including small capitals, petite capitals, titling, and capital spacing. 這些樣式格式可讓您控制大寫字的外觀。These styling formats allow you to control the appearance of capitals. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的標準大寫字母，後面接著樣式設定為 "SmallCaps" 和 "AllSmallCaps" 的字母。The following text displays standard capital letters for the Pescadero font, followed by the letters styled as "SmallCaps" and "AllSmallCaps". 在此情況下，三個單字全都使用相同的字型大小。In this case, the same font size is used for all three words. ![使用 OpenType 大寫的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "使用 OpenType 大寫的文字")![Text using OpenType capitals](~/add/media/opentypefont11.gif "Text using OpenType capitals") 大寫字的範例Example of capitals 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Pescadero 字型的大寫字使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define capitals for the Pescadero font, using the property. 使用 "SmallCaps" 格式時會略過任何開頭的大寫字母。When the "SmallCaps" format is used, any leading capital letter is ignored. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#9](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#9)] 下列程式碼範例可以完成與先前標記範例相同的工作。The following code example accomplishes the same task as the previous markup example. [!code-csharp[TypographyCodeSnippets#TypographyCodeSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TypographyCodeSnippets/CSharp/Page1.xaml.cs#typographycodesnippet1)] [!code-vb[TypographyCodeSnippets#TypographyCodeSnippet1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/TypographyCodeSnippets/visualbasic/page1.xaml.vb#typographycodesnippet1)] ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件* **Typography.Capitals**= 「"/ >\<*object* **Typography.Capitals**=""/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 大寫字母間距功能可讓您在全部使用大寫字的文字中，提供更多的間距。Capital spacing is a feature that allows you to provide more spacing when using all capitals in text. 大寫字母通常會設計為與小寫字母混合在一起。Capital letters are typically designed to blend with lowercase letters. 大寫字母和小寫字母間看起來很不錯的間距，在全部使用大寫字母時會看起來很擠。Spacing that appears attractive between and a capital letter and a lowercase letter may look too tight when all capital letters are used. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的正常和大寫字間距。The following text displays normal and capital spacing for the Pescadero font. ![使用 opentype 大寫留空的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "使用 opentype 大寫留空的文字")![Text using OpenType capital spacing](~/add/media/opentypefont21.gif "Text using OpenType capital spacing") 範例中的正常和大寫字母間距Example of normal and capital spacing 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Pescadero 字型的大寫字母間距使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define capital spacing for the Pescadero font, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 隨機內容替代項目提供單一字元的多個替代字符。Random contextual alternates provide multiple substitute glyphs for a single character. 以書寫體字型實作時，這項功能可以使用一組隨機選擇的字符，在外觀上略加變動來模擬手寫。When implemented with script-type fonts, this feature can simulate handwriting by using of a set of randomly chosen glyphs with slight differences in appearance. 下列文字使用 Lindsey 字型的隨機內容替代項目。The following text uses random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font. 請注意，字母 "a" 的外觀略有不同。Notice that the letter "a" varies slightly in appearance ![使用 OpenType 隨機內容替代的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "使用 OpenType 隨機內容替代文字")![Text using OpenType random contextual alternates](~/add/media/opentypefont23.gif "Text using OpenType random contextual alternates") 範例中的隨機內容替代項目Example of random contextual alternates 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Lindsey 字型的隨機內容替代項目使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define random contextual alternates for the Lindsey font, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 內容連音符號旨在提供組成連音符號的字元間更好的聯結行為，以提升可讀性。Contextual ligatures are designed to enhance readability by providing better joining behavior between the characters that make up the ligature. 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援內容連字，字母的預設表單隨即出現。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support contextual ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.ContextualLigatures**="*bool*"/>\<*object* **Typography.ContextualLigatures**="*bool*"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 某些花飾字字符的組合會導致不討喜的外觀，例如相鄰字母的伸尾部分重疊。Certain combinations of swash glyphs can cause an unattractive appearance, such as overlapping descenders on adjacent letters. 使用內容花飾字可讓您使用會產生更佳外觀的替代花飾字字符。Using a contextual swash allows you to use a substitute swash glyph that produces a better appearance. 下列文字顯示套用內容花飾字之前和之後的相同字組。The following text shows the same word before and after a contextual swash is applied. ![使用 OpenType 內容花飾字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "使用 OpenType 內容花飾字的文字")![Text using OpenType contextual swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont19.gif "Text using OpenType contextual swashes") 內容花飾字的範例Example of a contextual swash 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Pescadero 字型的內容花飾字使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define a contextual swash for the Pescadero font, using the property. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 古體形式是過去常用的印刷樣式慣例。Historical forms are typographic conventions that were common in the past. 下列文字使用 Palatino Linotype 字型的古體形式字符顯示 "Boston, Massachusetts" 片語。The following text displays the phrase, "Boston, Massachusetts", using an historical form of glyphs for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 opentype 古體形式的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "使用 opentype 古體形式的文字")![Text using OpenType historical forms](~/add/media/opentypefont10.gif "Text using OpenType historical forms") 古體形式的範例Example of historical forms 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Palatino Linotype 字型的古體形式使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define historical forms for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. summary.span: 取得或設定 列舉值，這個值表示在使用數字時的寬度對齊方式。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumerated value that indicates the alighnment of widths when using numerals.
A enumerated value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. OpenType 字型支援的調和間距與表格式數項功能，使用數字時，控制寬度對齊。OpenType fonts support a proportional and tabular figure feature to control the alignment of widths when using numerals. 調和間距數字會將每一個數字視為具有不同的寬度，"1" 比 "5" 窄。Proportional figures treat each numeral as having a different width—"1" is narrower than "5". 表格式數字則視為等寬數字，以便垂直對齊，可提高財務類資訊的可讀性。Tabular figures are treated as equal-width numerals so that they align vertically, which increases the readability of financial type information. 下列文字在第一個資料行中顯示使用 Miramonte 字型的兩個調和間距數字。The following text displays two proportional figures in the first column using the Miramonte font. 請注意數字 "5" 和 "1" 之間的寬度差異。Note the difference in width between the numerals "5" and "1". 第二個資料行顯示相同的兩個數值，使用表格式數字功能調整其寬度。The second column shows the same two numeric values with the widths adjusted by using the tabular figure feature. ![使用 OpenType 調和間距與表格式數字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "使用 OpenType 調和間距與表格式數字的文字")![Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures](~/add/media/opentypefont22.gif "Text using OpenType proportional & tabular figures") 調和間距與索引標籤式的數字的範例Example of proportional and tabbed figures 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Miramonte 字型的調和間距與表格式數字使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define proportional and tabular figures for the Miramonte font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#OpenTypeFontSnippet19](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/Window1.xaml#opentypefontsnippet19)] ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.NumericalAlignment**=""/>\<*object* **Typography.NumericalAlignment**=""/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. OpenType 字型支援舊樣式數字格式。OpenType fonts support an old style numeral format. 此格式適用於顯示樣式不再標準的數字。This format is useful for displaying numerals in styles that are no longer standard. 下列文字使用 Palatino Linotype 字型的標準和舊樣式數字格式顯示 18 世紀的日期。The following text displays an 18th century date in standard and old style numeral formats for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字的文字")![Text using OpenType old style numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont24.gif "Text using OpenType old style numerals") 標準和舊樣式數字的範例Example of standard and old style numerals 下列文字顯示 Palatino Linotype 字型的標準數字，後面接著舊樣式數字的數字。The following text displays standard numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, followed by old style numerals. ![使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字集的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "使用 OpenType 舊樣式數字集的文字")![Text using OpenType old style numeral sets](~/add/media/opentypefont13.gif "Text using OpenType old style numeral sets") 標準和舊樣式數字集的範例Example of standard and old style numeral sets 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Palatino Linotype 字型的舊樣式數字使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define old style numerals for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#11)] ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.NumeralStyle**=""/>\<*object* **Typography.NumeralStyle**=""/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值表示名義上的零字型形式是否應該替換成斜線零。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether a nominal zero font form should be replaced with a slashed zero.

value.span: 如果啟用斜線零形式則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if slashed zero forms are enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. OpenType 字型支援加斜線的零數字格式，以強調字母"O"與數字"0"之間的差異。OpenType fonts support a slashed zero numeral format to emphasize the difference between the letter "O" and the numeral "0". 加斜線的零數字通常用於財務和商務資訊中的識別碼。The slashed zero numeral is often used for identifiers in financial and business information. 下列文字顯示使用 Miramonte 字型的範例訂單識別碼。The following text displays a sample order identifier using the Miramonte font. 第一行使用標準的數字。The first line uses standard numerals. 第二行使用加斜線的零數字，以突顯與大寫字母 "O" 的對比。The second line used slashed zero numerals to provide better contrast with the uppercase "O" letter. ![使用 OpenType 斜式零的數字](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "文字使用 OpenType 斜式零的數字")![Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals](~/add/media/opentypefont17.gif "Text using OpenType slashed zero numerals") 範例中的斜線零數字Example of slashed zero numerals 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義斜線零數字 Miramonte 字型，使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define slashed zero numerals for the Miramonte font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#OpenTypeFontSnippet15](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#opentypefontsnippet15)] 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援斜式零形式時，會顯示數字的預設表單。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support slashed zero forms, the default form of the numeral is displayed. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件* **Typography.SlashedZero**="*bool*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.SlashedZero**="*bool*"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

summary.span: 取得或設定值，該值表示是否啟用標準連字。

value.span: 如果啟用標準連字則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if standard ligatures are enabled; otherwise, .
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 下列文字顯示 Pericles 字型的標準連音符號字符。The following text displays standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont04.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 標準連音符號集的範例Example of standard set of ligatures 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Pericles 字型的標準連音符號字符使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define standard ligature glyphs for the Pericles font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#4)] 根據預設，在 OpenTypes 字型[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]啟用標準連音符號。By default, OpenTypes fonts in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] enable standard ligatures. 例如，如果您使用 Palatino Linotype 字型，標準連音符號 "fi"、"ff" 和 "fl" 會顯示為合併的字元字符。For example, if you use the Palatino Linotype font, the standard ligatures "fi", "ff", and "fl" appear as a combined character glyph. 請注意，每個標準連音符號的成對字元都彼此相鄰。Notice that the pair of characters for each standard ligature touch each other. ![使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "使用 OpenType 標準連音符號的文字")![Text using OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont06.gif "Text using OpenType standard ligatures") 依預設啟用的標準連音符號的範例Example of standard ligatures enabled by default 不過，您可以停用標準連音符號功能，讓 "ff" 等標準連音符號顯示為兩個分開的字符，而不是合併的字元字符。However, you can disable standard ligature features so that a standard ligature such as "ff" displays as two separate glyphs, rather than as a combined character glyph. ![文字使用已停用 OpenType 標準連音符號](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "文字使用已停用 OpenType 標準連音符號")![Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures](~/add/media/opentypefont07.gif "Text using disabled OpenType standard ligatures") 已停用的標準連音符號的範例Example of disabled standard ligatures 下列程式碼範例示範如何停用 Palatino Linotype 字型的標準連音符號字符使用屬性。The following code example shows how to disable standard ligature glyphs for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#6)] 如果值是`true`和選取的字型不支援標準連音符號，字母的預設表單隨即出現。If the value of is `true` and the selected font does not support standard ligatures, the default form of the letter is displayed. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件* **Typography.StandardLigatures**="*bool*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.StandardLigatures**="*bool*"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

value.span: 標準 Swash 形式的索引。

span.span: The index of the standard swashes form.
The default value is 0 (zero).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 花飾字是裝飾性字符，會使用精心設計且通常與書寫體相關聯的裝飾。Swashes are decorative glyphs that use elaborate ornamentation often associated with calligraphy. 下列文字顯示 Pescadero 字型的標準和花飾字字符。The following text displays standard and swash glyphs for the Pescadero font. ![使用 OpenType 標準和花飾字字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "使用 OpenType 標準和花飾字字符的文字")![Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont08.gif "Text using OpenType standard and swash glyphs") 標準和花飾字字符的範例Example of standard and swash glyphs 花飾字通常用為簡短片語中的裝飾項目，例如事件宣告。Swashes are often used as decorative elements in short phrases such as event announcements. 下列文字使用花飾字強調大寫字母的事件名稱。The following text uses swashes to emphasize the capital letters of the name of the event. ![使用 OpenType 花飾字的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "使用 OpenType 花飾字的文字")![Text using OpenType swashes](~/add/media/opentypefont09.gif "Text using OpenType swashes") 花飾字大寫的字母所使用的範例Example of swashes used for capital letters 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義字型的花飾字使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define swashes for a font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#7)] 如果值大於零與所選取的字型不支援指定的索引值的標準 swash 形式時，會顯示字母的預設表單。If the value of is greater than zero and the selected font does not support standard swashes forms at the given index value, the default form of the letter is displayed. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件* **Typography.StandardSwashes**="*int*"/ >\<*object* **Typography.StandardSwashes**="*int*"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. 替代項目是可以取代標準字符的字符。Alternates are glyphs that can be substituted for a standard glyph. OpenType 字型，例如在下列範例中，使用的 Pericles 字型包含可用來建立不同的文字外觀的替代字符。OpenType fonts, such as the Pericles font used in the following examples, contain alternate glyphs that you can use to create different appearances for text. 下列文字顯示 Pericles 字型的標準字符。The following text displays standard glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 標準字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "使用 OpenType 標準字符的文字")![Text using OpenType standard glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont01.gif "Text using OpenType standard glyphs") 字符的標準集範例Example of standard set of glyphs Pericles OpenType 字型包含其他字符，提供文體替代圖像 （glyph） 的標準集合。The Pericles OpenType font contains additional glyphs that provide stylistic alternates to the standard set of glyphs. 下列文字顯示文體替代字符。The following text displays stylistic alternate glyphs. ![使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont02.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 文體替代字符的範例Example of stylistic alternate glyphs 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義 Pericles 字型的文體替代字符使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define stylistic alternate glyphs for the Pericles font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#2)] 下列文字顯示數個 Pericles 字型的其他文體替代字符。The following text displays several other stylistic alternate glyphs for the Pericles font. ![使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont03.gif "使用 OpenType 文體替代字符的文字")![Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs](~/add/media/opentypefont03.gif "Text using OpenType stylistic alternate glyphs") 其他文體替代字符的範例Example of other stylistic alternate glyphs 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義這些其他文體替代字符。The following code example shows how to define these other stylistic alternate glyphs. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#3)] ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*object* **Typography.StylisticAlternates**="*int*"/>\<*object* **Typography.StylisticAlternates**="*int*"/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |

summary.span: 取得或設定 列舉值，這個值表示要使用的標準印刷形式的變化。

span.span: Gets or sets a enumerated value that indicates a variation of the standard typographic form to be used.
A enumerated value.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性會取得或設定值，在擁有的物件`Typography`屬性，這是唯一的方式來存取類別執行個體。This property gets or sets a value on the object that owns a `Typography` property, which is the only way to access a class instance. 此外，這個屬性還支援中的附加的屬性使用方式，因此它可以設定上的文字包含物件[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]。In addition, this property supports an attached property usage so that it can be set on text-containing objects in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xaml](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xaml-md.md)]. Variant 則類似於 p 或註標的字型型態。Variants are similar to superscript or subscript font forms. 您有字型表單，以包含不同的字符集上標和序數的表單，或之間註標和較差的表單。It is possible for a font form to contain differing glyph sets between superscript and the ordinal form, or between subscript and inferior forms. 屬性可讓您設定的 OpenType 字型的上標和下標值。The property allows you to set superscript and subscript values for an OpenType font. 下列文字顯示上標 Palatino Linotype 字型。The following text displays superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 上標的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "使用 OpenType 上標的文字")![Text using OpenType superscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont14.gif "Text using OpenType superscripts") 上標的範例Example of superscripts 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義上標 Palatino Linotype 字型，使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define superscripts for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#12)] 下列文字顯示下標 Palatino Linotype 字型。The following text displays subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font. ![使用 OpenType 下標的文字](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "使用 OpenType 下標的文字")![Text using OpenType subscripts](~/add/media/opentypefont15.gif "Text using OpenType subscripts") 註標的範例Example of subscripts 下列程式碼範例示範如何定義下標 Palatino Linotype 字型，使用屬性。The following code example shows how to define subscripts for the Palatino Linotype font, using the property. [!code-xaml[OpenTypeFontSamples#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/OpenTypeFontSamples/CS/PageOne.xaml#13)] 不支援 variant 的字型可能會有字型形式的演算法近似值。Fonts that do not support variants may have an algorithmic approximation of the font form. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage \<*物件* **Typography.Variants**= 「"/ >\<*object* **Typography.Variants**=""/> ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|, , , , |
